## Discussion

The phone number of a critical message recipient. When the framework calls [doc://com.apple.messages/documentation/Messages/MSCriticalSMSMessenger/requestAuthorization(for:)] it shows this phone number to a person.

# phoneNumber

**Instance Property**

The phone number of a critical message recipient.

## Declaration

```swift
var phoneNumber: String
```

## Discussion

The phone number of a critical message recipient. When the framework calls [doc://com.apple.messages/documentation/Messages/MSCriticalSMSMessenger/requestAuthorization(for:)] it shows this phone number to a person.
title: phoneNumber
